root.name: ·人才检索
root.resume: functionURLRPL(url,siteid){if(siteid=="2")url=url.replace("/pub/./","/");elseif(siteid=="8")url=url.replace("/pub/./","/wsbs/zypxjd/");elseif(siteid=="10")url=url.replace("/pub/./","/kyzd/");document.write(url);}functionsearch_onsubmit1(){document.charset='UTF-8';varkeyWord="";keyWord=document.searchForm1.keyword.value;varSQL="";varSQLTitle="";varSQLKeyword="";varSQLChannel="";varTitlee="";varContents="";varSQLContent="";varchannelid_old="";varkeywordX="and";if(keyWord==""){SQLKeyword="";alert("关键字不能为空");returnfalse;}if(keyWord!=""&&keywordX=="and"){SQLKeyword=""+keyWord;}channelid_old=document.searchForm1.channelid_old.value;if(channelid_old=="200901"){SQLChannel="(docchannel=(6757,6758,6759,6760,6761,6762,6763,6764,6765,6766,6767,6768,6769,6770,6771))";}elseif(channelid_old=="200902"){SQLChannel="(docchannel=(7287,7288,7289,7290,7291,7292,7293,7294,7285,7295,7296,7297,7298,7299,7300,7301,7302,7303))";}else{SQLChannel="DOCCHANNEL='"+channelid_old+"'";}SQL=SQLTitle+SQLContent+SQLChannel;//varLength=SQL.length;//SQL=SQL.substring(0,Length-4);document.searchForm1.extrasql.value=SQL;//alert(document.searchForm1.searchword.value);document.searchForm1.searchword.value=SQLKeyword;document.searchForm1.channelid.value="298026";//alert(SQL);returntrue;}行政审批事项个人办事单位办事表格下载行政审批结果反馈频道检索分类表格下载办事指南关键字当前位置:上海市人力资源和社会保障网-2014版12333-网上办事-单位办事-人事人才-人才检索在线受理网上咨询公众监督政策问答.h1{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:22pt;MARGIN:17pt0cm16.5pt;LINE-HEIGHT:240%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.h2{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:16pt;MARGIN:13pt0cm;LINE-HEIGHT:173%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.h3{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:16pt;MARGIN:13pt0cm;LINE-HEIGHT:173%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}DIV.union{FONT-SIZE:14px;LINE-HEIGHT:18px}DIV.unionTD{FONT-SIZE:14px;LINE-HEIGHT:18px}.h1{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:22pt;MARGIN:17pt0cm16.5pt;LINE-HEIGHT:240%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.h2{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:16pt;MARGIN:13pt0cm;LINE-HEIGHT:173%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.h3{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:16pt;MARGIN:13pt0cm;LINE-HEIGHT:173%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.union{FONT-SIZE:14px;LINE-HEIGHT:18px}.unionTD{FONT-SIZE:14px;LINE-HEIGHT:18px}//职位检索functioncpsubmit(){if(document.all['temp'].value=="输入职位/公司关键字")document.all['temp'].value="";if(document.frmJob.radioComp.checked){document.frmJob.post.value="";document.frmJob.company.value=document.frmJob.temp.value;}if(document.frmJob.radioPost.checked){document.frmJob.post.value=document.frmJob.temp.value;document.frmJob.company.value="";}document.frmJob.submit();}functionclearfield(){if(window.document.all['temp'].value=="输入职位/公司关键字")window.document.all['temp'].value="";}functioninfClear(){window.document.all['searchPostLog.jobaddress'].selectedIndex=0;window.document.all['searchPostLog.posttype'].selectedIndex=0;window.document.all['searchPostLog.opendate'].selectedIndex=0;}functionswitchChange(){document.all['searchPostLog.posttype'].value="";document.all['searchPostLog.sposttype'].value="";if(document.all['searchPostLog.seniorFlag'].value=="2"){document.all.sen.style.display="block";document.all.gen.style.display="none";}else{document.all.sen.style.display="none";document.all.gen.style.display="block";}}functionpostTypeChange(){if(document.all['searchPostLog.seniorFlag'].value=="2"){document.all['searchPostLog.posttype'].value=document.all['searchPostLog.sposttype'].value;}if(document.all['searchPostLog.seniorFlag'].value=="1"){document.all['searchPostLog.posttype'].value=document.all['searchPostLog.gposttype'].value;}}//检索人才functionqueryPerson(){if(document.all['switch'].value=="2"){document.all['searchPersonLog.post'].value=document.all['searchPersonLog.spost'].value;}if(document.all['switch'].value=="1"){document.all['searchPersonLog.post'].value=document.all['searchPersonLog.gpost'].value;}document.frmPerson.submit();}functionChangeOption1(){vartt=document.frmPerson.FunType.valuevarFuns=tt.split(",")varFuns2=tt.split(",")varFuns3=tt.split(",")if(document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig){document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.gpost').options.length=0if(document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value=="")document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.gpost').options[0]=newOption("---请选择---",""){if(document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value==""){j=1}else{j=0}for(vari=0;i<Funs.length;i++){if(Funs[i].substring(0,2)==document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value){document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.gpost').options[j]=newOption(Funs[i].substring(4,Funs[i].length),Funs[i].substring(0,4))j++;}}}document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.gpost').selectedIndex=0}}functionChangeOption3(){vartt=document.frmPerson.SFunType.value;varFuns=tt.split(",");varFuns2=tt.split(",");varFuns3=tt.split(",");if(document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig){document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.spost').options.length=0;if(document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value=="")document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.spost').options[0]=newOption("---请选择---","");{if(document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value==""){j=1;}else{j=0;}for(vari=0;i<Funs.length;i++){if(Funs[i].substring(0,2)==document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value){document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.spost').options[j]=newOption(Funs[i].substring(4,Funs[i].length),Funs[i].substring(0,4));j++;}}}document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.spost').selectedIndex=0;}}functionsoncheck(temp){window.location="/login/mailingLogin.action?postid="+temp;}functionChange(){ChangeOption1();ChangeOption3();}functionpersonSwitchChange(){if(document.all['switch'].value=="2"){document.all.senPerson.style.display="block";document.all.genPerson.style.display="none";}else{document.all.senPerson.style.display="none";document.all.genPerson.style.display="block";}}/*functioninitType(){document.all['switch'].value="";document.all['switch'].value="1"}*/高级人才雇员服务人事代理诚信测评---工作年限---应届毕业生一年以上二年以上三年以上四年以上五年以上六年以上七年以上八年以上九年以上十年以上---学历---博士研究生初中以下其他双硕双本双专大学本科大学毕业大学专科和专科学校专科毕业研究生毕业中专毕业中技毕业技工学校毕业高中毕业职业高中毕业初中毕业一般职位高级职位--工作类型--经营/生产管理类行政/人事/文职类公关/市场/广告/会展类贸易/销售/客户服务类计算机/互联网类财会/审计/统计/金融类机械工程技术类化工/制药/环境/生物工程技术类电子/通讯/电气/电力工程技术类建筑/房地产工程技术类纺织/服装/食品工程技术类造纸/印刷/家具家电制造工程技术类其他工程技术类教育/科研/文体/出版/传媒类医疗/卫生/护理/保健类物流/仓储类法律/翻译/咨询服务类旅游/酒店/餐饮/商场/娱乐服务类农林牧渔类规划/设计/园林绿化类技工类其他类---请选择------请选择---高级管理行政人事市场/广告IT销售财务金融生产制造/工程社科律师物流/贸易/采购酒店餐饮建筑/房地产医疗/护理服装/纺织生物/化工/制药/医疗器械其他---请选择--- .h1{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:22pt;MARGIN:17pt0cm16.5pt;LINE-HEIGHT:240%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.h2{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:16pt;MARGIN:13pt0cm;LINE-HEIGHT:173%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.h3{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:16pt;MARGIN:13pt0cm;LINE-HEIGHT:173%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}DIV.union{FONT-SIZE:14px;LINE-HEIGHT:18px}DIV.unionTD{FONT-SIZE:14px;LINE-HEIGHT:18px}.h1{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:22pt;MARGIN:17pt0cm16.5pt;LINE-HEIGHT:240%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.h2{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:16pt;MARGIN:13pt0cm;LINE-HEIGHT:173%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.h3{FONT-WEIGHT:bold;TEXT-JUSTIFY:inter-ideograph;FONT-SIZE:16pt;MARGIN:13pt0cm;LINE-HEIGHT:173%;TEXT-ALIGN:justify}.union{FONT-SIZE:14px;LINE-HEIGHT:18px}.unionTD{FONT-SIZE:14px;LINE-HEIGHT:18px}//职位检索functioncpsubmit(){if(document.all['temp'].value=="输入职位/公司关键字")document.all['temp'].value="";if(document.frmJob.radioComp.checked){document.frmJob.post.value="";document.frmJob.company.value=document.frmJob.temp.value;}if(document.frmJob.radioPost.checked){document.frmJob.post.value=document.frmJob.temp.value;document.frmJob.company.value="";}document.frmJob.submit();}functionclearfield(){if(window.document.all['temp'].value=="输入职位/公司关键字")window.document.all['temp'].value="";}functioninfClear(){window.document.all['searchPostLog.jobaddress'].selectedIndex=0;window.document.all['searchPostLog.posttype'].selectedIndex=0;window.document.all['searchPostLog.opendate'].selectedIndex=0;}functionswitchChange(){document.all['searchPostLog.posttype'].value="";document.all['searchPostLog.sposttype'].value="";if(document.all['searchPostLog.seniorFlag'].value=="2"){document.all.sen.style.display="block";document.all.gen.style.display="none";}else{document.all.sen.style.display="none";document.all.gen.style.display="block";}}functionpostTypeChange(){if(document.all['searchPostLog.seniorFlag'].value=="2"){document.all['searchPostLog.posttype'].value=document.all['searchPostLog.sposttype'].value;}if(document.all['searchPostLog.seniorFlag'].value=="1"){document.all['searchPostLog.posttype'].value=document.all['searchPostLog.gposttype'].value;}}//检索人才functionqueryPerson(){if(document.all['switch'].value=="2"){document.all['searchPersonLog.post'].value=document.all['searchPersonLog.spost'].value;}if(document.all['switch'].value=="1"){document.all['searchPersonLog.post'].value=document.all['searchPersonLog.gpost'].value;}document.frmPerson.submit();}functionChangeOption1(){vartt=document.frmPerson.FunType.valuevarFuns=tt.split(",")varFuns2=tt.split(",")varFuns3=tt.split(",")if(document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig){document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.gpost').options.length=0if(document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value=="")document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.gpost').options[0]=newOption("---请选择---",""){if(document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value==""){j=1}else{j=0}for(vari=0;i<Funs.length;i++){if(Funs[i].substring(0,2)==document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.WorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value){document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.gpost').options[j]=newOption(Funs[i].substring(4,Funs[i].length),Funs[i].substring(0,4))j++;}}}document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.gpost').selectedIndex=0}}functionChangeOption3(){vartt=document.frmPerson.SFunType.value;varFuns=tt.split(",");varFuns2=tt.split(",");varFuns3=tt.split(",");if(document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig){document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.spost').options.length=0;if(document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value=="")document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.spost').options[0]=newOption("---请选择---","");{if(document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value==""){j=1;}else{j=0;}for(vari=0;i<Funs.length;i++){if(Funs[i].substring(0,2)==document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig[document.frmPerson.SWorkFunBig.selectedIndex].value){document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.spost').options[j]=newOption(Funs[i].substring(4,Funs[i].length),Funs[i].substring(0,4));j++;}}}document.getElementById('searchPersonLog.spost').selectedIndex=0;}}functionsoncheck(temp){window.location="/login/mailingLogin.action?postid="+temp;}functionChange(){ChangeOption1();ChangeOption3();}functionpersonSwitchChange(){if(document.all['switch'].value=="2"){document.all.senPerson.style.display="block";document.all.genPerson.style.display="none";}else{document.all.senPerson.style.display="none";document.all.genPerson.style.display="block";}}/*functioninitType(){document.all['switch'].value="";document.all['switch'].value="1"}*/高级人才雇员服务人事代理诚信测评---工作年限---应届毕业生一年以上二年以上三年以上四年以上五年以上六年以上七年以上八年以上九年以上十年以上---学历---博士研究生初中以下其他双硕双本双专大学本科大学毕业大学专科和专科学校专科毕业研究生毕业中专毕业中技毕业技工学校毕业高中毕业职业高中毕业初中毕业一般职位高级职位--工作类型--经营/生产管理类行政/人事/文职类公关/市场/广告/会展类贸易/销售/客户服务类计算机/互联网类财会/审计/统计/金融类机械工程技术类化工/制药/环境/生物工程技术类电子/通讯/电气/电力工程技术类建筑/房地产工程技术类纺织/服装/食品工程技术类造纸/印刷/家具家电制造工程技术类其他工程技术类教育/科研/文体/出版/传媒类医疗/卫生/护理/保健类物流/仓储类法律/翻译/咨询服务类旅游/酒店/餐饮/商场/娱乐服务类农林牧渔类规划/设计/园林绿化类技工类其他类---请选择------请选择---高级管理行政人事市场/广告IT销售财务金融生产制造/工程社科律师物流/贸易/采购酒店餐饮建筑/房地产医疗/护理服装/纺织生物/化工/制药/医疗器械其他---请选择---
